definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
to herd/to breed livestock/to govern (old)/government official (old)

sentences.english: The distribution and expansion of Rumex nepalensis was affected by local traditional grazing regimes.
sentences.chinese: 土大黄的分布和扩张与传统的轮牧体系息息相关。

sentences.english: Experts say that while rotational grazing can save money over time , it also requires planning.
sentences.chinese: 专家称，虽然轮牧经济省钱，它也需要周密筹划。

sentences.english: We willtalkmore rotational grazing next week.
sentences.chinese: 下周我们将更多地探讨轮牧。

sentences.english: What you mean is rotation grazing, not allowing animals to graze on rotated pasture. Right?
sentences.chinese: 您说的是轮牧，轮流放牧的意思。对吧？

sentences.english: Settled grazing means livestock herders to settle in and built ring, rotating grazing pastures on a seasonal basis.
sentences.chinese: 定居放牧是指牧人定居并建有畜圈，草场按季节轮牧。

definition: to breed (livestock, fish, crops etc)/to grow/to raise
rotation of crops (to preserve fertility of soil)
to plant trees in order to stabilize sand (idiom)
